hero.title: Dinislam Battalov
hero.box1: Co-founder of <1>Battalov Iskanderov International</1>, a company operating in investment projects and real estate management.
hero.box2: Builds partnerships and guides investors through all stages — from company registration to asset management.
hero.box3: Maintains an extensive network of business contacts: government entities, developers, and property owners.
hero.box4: Participates in projects across real estate, hospitality, and education sectors in the Kingdom.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.p1: — an international company promoting investment opportunities in Saudi Arabia for Russian-speaking countries.
whoWeAre.listItem3: Manage companies and real estate assets.

goal1.title: 1. Sector Development
goal1.description: Support the development of industrial, agricultural, and commercial sectors in Saudi Arabia.

goal2.title: 2. Investor Support
goal2.description: Offer consulting and legal support to international companies seeking to invest in the Kingdom.

goal3.title: 3. Project Management
goal3.description: Manage investment projects for foreign investors in Saudi Arabia.

goal4.title: 4. Education Promotion
goal4.description: Internationally promote educational initiatives in Saudi Arabia (universities, Arabic language institutes, international schools).

goal5.title: 5. Real Estate Management
goal5.description: Manage and operate real estate assets (hotels, apartments, land plots) on behalf of foreign investors.

project1.title: Real Estate
project1.item1: Management of a portfolio of properties and serviced apartments in Medina.
project1.item2: Currently developing a residential complex and residential towers project in Medina.

project2.title: Education
project2.description: The company holds a stake in the educational project — Institute Taaba — and actively supports its development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.p1: To become a leading facilitator of business connections between Saudi and international organizations.
vision.p2: Goal: Deliver a consistent pipeline of investment opportunities for entrepreneurs worldwide.

footer.description: Your reliable partner in Saudi Arabia. I assist with visas, company registration, residency permits (Iqama), and premium Umrah tour organization.
footer.copyright: © 2025 D.E.E.N. Digital Agency. All rights reserved.

hero.title: Business Forum in Saudi Arabia
hero.subtitle: A premium platform where Muslim entrepreneurs from around the world unite around principles of partnership, growth, and spiritual values.

whatYouGet.title: What You’ll Gain at the Forum

card1.title: Expert Knowledge
card1.p1: Receive unique insights from Khandamir Nusratkhuzhaev on 15 partnership principles that enable business scaling without conflict or losses.
card1.p2: Learn practical tools for doing business in Saudi Arabia from active entrepreneurs and practitioners, including Dinislam Battalov.

card2.title: Valuable Networking
card2.p1: Build strong business relationships with Muslim entrepreneurs, investors, and experts from diverse countries.
card2.p2: Find potential partners and investors to grow your business in Saudi Arabia and beyond.

card3.title: Growth in KSA
card3.p1: Understand the nuances of doing business in the Kingdom and receive actionable recommendations for successful launch and growth.
card3.p2: Join the formation of a Russian-speaking business community in Saudi Arabia, grounded in Islamic values.

mission.title: Forum Mission and Goals
mission.missionText: Our forum is a platform for dialogue and collaboration, built on the principles of partnership, mutual development, and shared spiritual values.
mission.goal1: Transfer to participants Khandamir’s 15 partnership principles — enabling conflict- and loss-free business scaling.
mission.goal2: Provide real-world tools for business in KSA — through speakers, practitioners, and active entrepreneurs.
mission.goal3: Create a networking platform where businesspeople can find partners, investors, and trusted connections.
mission.goal4: Form the core of a Russian-speaking business community in Saudi Arabia — growing systematically and guided by Islamic values.

speaker.name: Khandamir Nusratkhuzhaev
speaker.title: Lead Speaker
speaker.bio1: International expert in Islamic finance with 10 years of experience; former member of the AAOIFI Board (2016–2023) and the Islamic Development Bank (KSA).
speaker.bio2: Co-author of AAOIFI financial standards adopted by Islamic financial institutions worldwide.
speaker.bio3: Active promoter of Islamic finance in Central Asia and Russia.
speaker.bio4: Over 25 years of experience in international finance, including with the 'Big Four' and IDB.
speaker.bio5: Holder of prestigious international qualifications in Islamic finance: CSAA, CIPA, CIAE.

standard.title: Standard
features: Basic welcome kit: badge, notebook, pen
Access to general Telegram channel for all participants

business.title: Business
features: Dedicated Telegram channel for Business-tier participants
Group photo with Khandamir in the main hall
Coffee break and light networking with business speakers

premium.title: Premium (VIP)
premium.description: Front-row seating, personal curator, gala dinner
features: Airport meet & greet with personalized Premium [Surname] sign
Gala dinner with Khandamir and speakers
Exclusive Telegram channel for Premium participants
Premium gifts: branded notebooks, pens, cardholders, T-shirts

platinum.title: Platinum
benefits: Advertising integration in forum brand book: full page
Product integration: opportunity to showcase your products
Maximum media exposure: logo placement everywhere

gold.title: Gold
benefits: Advertising spot: option to set up your own booth/materials
Logo visibility: banners, Telegram channel mentions

silver.title: Silver
benefits: Logo in general partner list on banners

day1.title: Training with Khandamir
content: A unique program where Khandamir reveals a partnership system for scaling business without conflict or losses
Practical case studies, interactive sessions, assignments, and live Q&A with Khandamir

day2.title: Business Forum
content: Stage presentations by entrepreneurs from Saudi Arabia, including Dinislam Battalov and invited speakers
Real business experience, case studies, networking, and collaboration opportunities

day3.title: Jeddah Business Tour or Premium Umrah
content: Business Tour: Visit 3–4 companies operating in Saudi Arabia’s real sectors
Premium Umrah: Organized by Hatch Center — private guided tour, accompaniment, spiritual program
